hero-main.heading: Affordable Health Care
hero-main.subheading: If you are looking for a clinic providing best quality health care at affordable and reasonable prices, you came to the right place.

hero-services.title: Checkups & Services
hero-services.subtitle: If you are looking for a clinic providing best quality health care at affordable and reasonable prices, you came to the right place.
hero-services.block_1: Medicine is a field with a strong history of creativity. Our doctors go beyond the normal standardization of an algorithmic approach to diagnosis and treatment and focus more on how to provide you the best care. We adapt to your needs and not the other way around.
hero-services.block_2: Dr. Abdulla Kamal Clinic has been around for 40 years. We have years of experience treating conditions from the common to the rare. Our reach is broad, we‚Äôve treated people from every corner of the world, and those people tell us they are highly satisfied with their

hero-services.block_4: Our qualified general practitioners are available 24/7 to help you with advice and quick consultations. You can be rest assured that for all your needs we will be available 365 days a year.

findADoctor.label_quickSearch_description: Our team of International doctors combine a formidable spread of expertise and experience with one shared mission: To provide patients with the highest possible standards of care and medical expertise.
